item.title: Andrea add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "They are enthusiasts, devotees. Addicts. Something about the circus stirs their souls, and they ache for it when it is absent. They seek each other out, these people of such specific like mind. They tell of how they found the circus, how those first few steps were like magic. Like stepping into a fairy tale under a curtain of starsâ€¦ When they depart, they shake hands and embrace like old friends, even if they have only just met, and as they go their separate ways they feel less alone than they had before." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Laura Esquivel
item.description: "[...] each of us is born with a box of matches inside us but we can't strike them all by ourselves" -- Laura Esquivel
